title: Rule-Based Curriculum Design for Programming Learning Objectives

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Intensive reinforcement of programming skills for workplace automation and data processing tailored for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the 15 Rules for Predicting Python Program Behavior (RPB) with 80% accuracy.
Learners can categorize and explain interaction patterns among variables, expressions, and functions by three levels of complexity.
Learners design an RPB rule set tailored to a work scenario and achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) from peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
